product_name: Onlyleaf 100% Natural Green Tea Sampler Box, 15 Tea Bags: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: In my 1st order, I ordered Chamomile tea(25 pack) for which 2 Jasmine tea samples are free. Though I shared feedback with Only Leaf team, I didn't review that order because of DTDC's bad service. Maybe I would have given 3/5. This week I ordered sample box. They are excellent. Loved the only leaf concept. This is how green tea bag should be. If you want to know the difference clearly, just have Only Leaf green tea today and any of other brands like Lipton, Tetley green tea. One can easily know the difference. I used Lipton for almost 2 years. Then I tried this because Chamomile tea is not available in Lipton/Tetley. From now on I will be using this. If anyone is thinking to buy this, without second thought go ahead. I suggest you to buy a sample pack 1st & try them, so that you can order your favourite flavors from next order.

The difference between other green tea and only leaf green tea is that there are whole actual green leaves, unlike others..and it’s very visible and looks healthier too...and the active flavor twist is an added zing...I can see actual chamomile flower petals on the chamomile tea..

This is better than most brands but I bought Teamonk Global along with this. And that is truly amazing. This is ₹6.5 per bag. That is ₹15 per bag. But the taste is absolutely amazing. This is good but has additives like flavour oils which is a bummer especially after knowing the superior quality of tea leaves used in it.

1.Just tried ginger mint lemon green,its ok..just after opening the pouch I smelled heavenly tea fragrance..piece of advice is dnt dip it 4too long,it might taste bitter,tasted ginger n mint,not the lemon..will update everything else later :-)2.Dandelion tastes just like plane green tea.3.Hibiscus cinnamon clove smells & tastes like cinnamon but good.4.Jasmine green smells like jasmine flower & when u sip it,u'l feel like u r drinking jasmine flower tea :-) I liked it.5.Organic green is very light green tea,not very strong at all.6. I didn't have chamomile tea b4,but m sure Chamomile green should have tasted better..I dnt like bitter tea flavor that's y I didn't dip the pouch for 2long..who knows if I had dipped it longer it might have been better tasting (wink wink) :-D7. Turmeric ginger tulsi green is very light..I tasted turmeric + tulsi..but not ginger8. Honey lemon green has very light yet very good taste9. Mint green is minty fresh..i liked it10. Tulsi green smells awesome in the bag..but when u dip it in warm water,it tastes even better..I dnt like tulsi tea much,so was saving it 4the last..but I was so surprised by its taste :-)

i ordered it seeing the reviews and starsworst experience dissapointed!!!!!!!!!tooooo much of artifical fragance  its almost like am drinking a floral perfume not green teaapart from fragance, taste is very bittermint and tulsi flavour r better......i tried temonk before...its kinda better den dis.... grinar detox green tea has a much better taste then dis

They give uh 10 different flavor tea bags...1.JASMINE GREEN: floral fragrant present...but u dont like it all regularly..strong fragrance present2.HONEY LEMON GREEN: waste...only honey fragrance..no taste of lemon at all...3.GINGER MINT LEMON GREEN: small pieces of ginger no taste of lemon or mint4.ORGANIC GREEN: normal green tea without any flavour.5.HIBISCUS CINNAMON CLOVE GREEN: u can seen in the picture clearly the petals of hibiscus.and it give some wrd Pinkish color to ur tea and some taste of cinnamon.6.DANDELION GREEN: small pieces of dandelion but no taste.7.CHAMOMILE GREEN: The flower of chamomile is presnt taste is worst .8.TULSI GREEN: u can see in the picture the small flower pieces of tulsi is prnt ths one is ok....9.MINT GREEN: fragrance of mint and small leaves of mint is present.10.TURMERIC GINGER TULSI GREEN: i love this flavor solid piece of turmeric present in the bag and it give yellow color to ur tea ginger enhance the flavor of tea....only this one i like other flavors or worst...not recommend at all.ok freshness is good but no flavor at all.....

I have been using Lipton or organic green tea ever since I started having green tea. One of my seniors recommended me 'only leaf' and I just loved it!There are actually leaves, turmeric pieces, tulsi leaves, lemongrass etc inside the tea bag.Only leaf is costing more or less same as the other green teas in the market so, why not ONLY LEAF? It's better than others.All the flavors are good but I particularly liked the kahwa green tea.

reviews.review_title: Even Borat would say, "Great success!!" to Only Leaf
reviews.review_body: A fantastic product and a thrifty snatch, "Only Leaf" brand is a well worthy international green tea market contender, to their own merit.Keep up the awesome work fellas! I prefer loose tea leaves to teabags, but this product is.. wow! And that's not even an exaggeration!- An ardent fan
